How did you put into practice the script: Kodi mudalemba bwanji lemba / nkhani yomwe tidaphunzira nthawi yapitayo tidakumana?
Who did you share last week's lesson wit: Kodi mudagawana chiyani sabata yatha ndipo zidapita bwanji?
What needs did you meet in the community: Zosowa zomwe mwakumana mdera latha sabata yatha?
Ask someone to read the passage one para: Funsani wina kuti awerenge ndime imodzi nthawi.
Have a group member tell it in their own: Khalani ndi gulu la gulu liuzeni m'mawu awoawo.
Ask the group if they added anything or: Funsani gululi ngati awonjezerapo chilichonse kapena kusiya chilichonse.
When you finish with ALL paragraphs, ask: Mukamaliza ndi ndime zonse, pemphani munthu wina m'gululi kuti afotokozere nkhani yonse. Khalani ndi gulu kuti likonze zolakwika zilizonse.
What does this passage tell us about God: Kodi ndimeyi ikutiuza chiyani za Mulungu?
What does this passage tell us about peo: Kodi ndimeyi ikutiuza chiyani za anthu?
If this passage is true, what behaviour: Ngati izi ndi zowona, kodi tiyenera kusintha chikhalidwe chiti sabata ino?
What needs can we meet in the community: Kodi ndi zofunikira ziti zomwe tingakumane mdera lanu sabata ino?
Would you like to discover with your fri: Kodi mukufuna kudziwa ndi anzanu zomwe Mulungu amakonda ndi momwe Mulungu amafuna kuti mukhale ndi moyo?
Here are some questions to get your disc: Nawa mafunso oti zokambirana zanu ziyambike.
Would you like to discover for yourself: Kodi mukufuna kupeza nokha zomwe Mulungu amakonda ndi momwe Mulungu amafuna kuti mukhale moyo?
Most people like to make these discoveri: Anthu ambiri amakonda kupanga zomwe zimapezeka pagulu ndi anzawo.
